name: Oxytropis
Relationship: Compare: ASTRAG.; LATHYR.; OXAL-AC.; BARYTA (Loco plant is rich in Baryta). LOLIUM.

Eyes: Sight obscured; pupils contracted; do not respond to light
Paralysis of nerves and muscles of eyes
Head: Vertigo
Full, warm feeling about head
Feeling of intoxication, with loss of vision
Pain in maxillary bones and masseter muscles
Mouth and nose dry
Rectum: Stools slip from anus, like LUMPS OF JELLY, mushy
Urging to urinate when thinking of it
Extremities: Pains come and go quickly, but muscles remain sore and stiff
Male: Pain in testicles and along spermatic cord and down thighs

details: Marked action on nervous system. Trembling, sensation of emptiness. Walks backwards. Congestion of spine and paralysis. Pains come and go quickly. Sphincters relaxed. Staggering gait. Reflexes lost.
